‘Dual-Bite’ is a high-performance, selectively bred strain of Neocaridina shrimp (Neocaridina davidi) that excels in the dual roles of aquarium cleaner and protein producer. This cultivar displays an intense, solid red coloration and is bred for both prolific breeding and a larger-than-typical body size. While continuously grazing on biofilm and detritus to maintain system cleanliness, ‘Dual-Bite’ reaches a substantial harvest size of 2.5-3.5 cm, offering sweet, tender morsels perfect for small-plate delicacies.
